author: Anonymous Helix
title: Search problem on the exam
question: Could someone help me explain how to solve the search problem with clear steps ? I find myself very chaotic when solving the search problem.
student_answer: uh... it might be a bit late now but what I did is to spend a lot of time figuring out the problem set and tutorial. At some point, I just comprehended. I don't wanna discourage you but ig there's no shortcut.
